title: Rainy city driving with moderate speed and frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle drives on a rainy city street, braking frequently and changing lanes.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.1 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The video shows a rainy city street with tall buildings on both sides. The road is wet and slippery, and the traffic is moderate. The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, and there are several other cars on the road. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and some of them are red. The weather is cloudy and rainy, and the visibility is moderate. The video shows the ego vehicle changing lanes and braking frequently, and there are several other cars on the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving on a rainy city street, and the driver needs to be cautious due to the wet and slippery road conditions. The driver is maintaining a moderate speed and braking frequently to avoid any accidents. The driver is also changing lanes to avoid getting stuck behind slower vehicles. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and the driver is following the traffic rules to ensure safe driving. The weather is cloudy and rainy, and the driver needs to be extra cautious to avoid any potential hazards.
